transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hi sir, good morning. Jyoti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye, good morning.
Executive: Ha sir, aapka lead services chal raha hai na IndiaMART ka? Isme aapka discussion hua tha Ashish ji se?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji, aur aapne sir actually kal ka video meeting bhi scheduled tha aap se, but aap available nahi ho paaye sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, toh thoda sa jaanna tha sir aapne feedback me bhi share kiya tha ki aap satisfied nahi hai sir. Thoda sa ek baar bata payenge sir kya issue aa raha hai service se related ya koi...
Customer: Pehle, pehle ek ladka handle kar raha tha, unka naam mereko idea nahi hai. Hmm. Okay. Hamara team check kar raha tha. Woh punctually meeting karta tha aur progress tha.
Executive: Matlab aapke jo previous account manager aap unki baat kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Ha, previous account manager tha. Fir Ashish aaya hai. Fir unhone aane ke baad hamare paas ek back office me ladki thi jo IndiaMART ko take care karti thi. Hmm. Un nahi hone ke wajah se, unhone resign karne ke wajah se hum log replace nahi kiya abhi woh position. Okay. So woh account, Ashish bhi recently one week back call kiya tha aur kal bhi call kiya tha woh. Woh hame training dene ready tha from his side. There is no issue. Okay. Mere jo dissatisfaction tha woh kal ka ya parso ka week ka nahi tha. Jab woh ladka jo account manager account sambhalta tha aapka IndiaMART ke side se. Hmm. Usse Ashish ka bahut zyada gap de diya hai aapne. Mahina dedh do mahina gap de diya hai. Okay, check. Hum do mahine se active nahi hai IndiaMART me.
Executive: Ha sir, ye aapka na even mai check kar rahi thi aapka jo performance hai buyleads ka. Last agar one month ki hum baat kar rahe hai woh three days aapne buyleads use kiya and last jo one week me matlab bilkul bhi buylead use nahi hua. Matlab jo gap aaya hai sir ye September ke baad se thoda gap aa gaya services me. Matlab August me thoda use ho raha tha. September me fir kam use hua, October me aur kam ho gaya, November me abhi tak aapne use hi nahi kiya.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Abhi kisi ne join kar liya hai sir waha pe?
Customer: Abhi, sir tomorrow ek possibility hai ek ladki join karne ka. Mai bolta hu once join hone ke mai I will call Ashish and usko training dene ke liye bolta hu at least woh October se active ho jaaye.
Executive: Okay, koi issue nahi hai sir. Dekho Ashish aapko isliye call kar raha tha sir ki so that aapke jaise jo services hai na sir, thik hai waha pe hum buyleads se aapko active kara sake. Kyuki isme sir yahi rehta hai na ki daily basis pe maan lo jaise aap leads consume karte ho toh waha pe aapka profile ka performance bhi increase hota hai, aapka visibility bhi increase hota hai and and you never know sir kaun sa customer takra jaaye aur woh convert ho jaaye waha pe. Okay. Toh bahut saari na buyer opportunity lost ho jaati hai sir. Toh maine isliye aapko connect kiya tha toh I thought Ashish ne jo aapko guide kiya shayad usme kuch na kuch matlab kuch gap hai ya fir cheeze clear nahi hui. Kyuki hame feedback aapka receive hua tha. Baaki aap ye chahte ki frequently 15 days, seven days me aapke call arrange karana hai toh aap mereko ek baar clear kar do. Hum us hisab se coordinate kar lenge. Kyuki actually aapka jaise abhi thoda time pehle hi Ashish ke paas me aapka profile move hua tha sir. Thik hai? Toh ha, every month toh aapke paas me one or two calls toh jaati hi hai but aapko chahiye ki nahi mereko matlab weekly ya fir 15 days me one or two calls chahiye. Toh us hisab se fir hum aapki profile pe mention kar denge toh uske accordingly aapse follow up karenge services ke liye sir. Hmm.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Abhi woh kal se join karenge sir aapke waha pe?
Customer: Join kara ke mai integrate karta hu.
Executive: Thik hai. Further sir abhi matlab ye login toh aapke paas me bhi hoga sir?
Customer: Ha ha, hai. Yes.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Mai claim karta hu, yes yes mai claim karta hu abhi tak kiya nahi. Okay. Mai kuch dekh leta hu aaj mere side se.
Executive: Ha aapne sir dekho jo bhi leads hoti hai na maan lo aapka sales person sometimes available hai, nahi hai, saara performance even then aap apne end pe bhi na sir beech beech me aap check kar liya karo sir. Ki kitna lead consume ho raha hai na. Baaki sir overall kaisa, kaisa conversion hai sir IndiaMART se kaisa business aa raha hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Abhi kaisa hai sir overall?
Customer: Abhi, abhi nahi madam abhi hum log claim nahi kiya hai as of now. Ek do claim, ek do cheeze hai hum log usko successful kiya hai. Okay. Other than that as of now ye saal me hum log kuch kiya nahi.
Executive: Thik hai. Baaki location preference sir matlab Andhra Pradesh me hi karte ho sir ya outside bhi karte ho?
Customer: Andhra Pradesh me hi karte hai. Outside abhi start nahi kiya hai. Woh pehle bhi discuss kiye hai. Hamara focus Andhra Pradesh me hi hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur thoda sa na sir aap maan lo jaise agar sales person aapka waha pe available nahi hai sir aapke paas access hoga. Aap primary mobile number se hi aap application ke through bhi jo bhi aapke liye relevant leads hai na woh aap consume kar sakte ho sir. Thik hai? Further waha pe hai ki dekho sir aapka jaise jo product hai na woh kaafi competitive product hai. Aap dekhna sir few fast buyleads me jaise lead generate hoti hai woh frequently woh sold out ho jaati hai. Jaise commercial reverse osmosis system ho gaya. Reverse osmosis plant ho gaya isme bahut zyada competition rehta hai sir. Okay. Ab maan lo ha toh waha pe sir thoda sa na active rehne ki zarurat hai. Baaki jaise service se related jo bhi aapko support chahiye woh Ashish aur mai Ashish ke senior baat kar rahi hu we will guide you aur aapke waha pe jo bhi join karenge toh unko bhi hum proper training provide kara denge toh woh as such kuch issue aapko hoga nahi services me.
Customer: Okay madam, thank you.
Executive: Toh video meeting ke regarding kal aap se coordinate kar le sir?
Customer: Madam, mai aapko shaam me hi confirm karta hu kaise karte hai.
Executive: Chalo koi issue nahi hai sir toh mai ye feedback yaha se close kar du aaj?
Customer: Right sir, okay.
Executive: Thik hai, mai aapko WhatsApp bhi kar deti hu apne number se, thik hai? Toh koi bhi time se related coordination aapko karna hai kuch bhi rahega toh aap mere se directly reach out kar sakte ho sir, thik hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay sir, thank you so much sir, have a good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfaction with current IndiaMART services.

- Lack of a dedicated back-office support person.

- Decrease in buylead usage in recent months.

- Wants frequent calls for service updates.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of buylead consumption.

- Executive offered frequent calls for service updates.

- Executive assured proper training for new joiners.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will confirm video meeting time in evening.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, training, follow up
